clusterList.phrase: you want to drink at a comfortable pace where you don't get sick from drinking and you stay hydrated
your body's pretty good at telling you when it needs extra water and when it doesn't listen to your thirst

there's an osmoreceptor in your brain that lets you know when there's a slight increase of chemicals that means there's less water more chemicals which triggers the thirst mechanism that causes you to seek drink
